title: The Green Hornet
actors: Gordon Jones, Wade Boteler, Keye Luke, Anne Nagel, Phillip Trent, Cy Kendall, Stanley Andrews, Selmer Jackson, Joseph Crehan, Walter McGrail, Gene Rizzi, John Kelly, Eddie Dunn, Edward Earle, Ben Taggart
description: A newspaper publisher and his Korean servant fight crime as vigilantes who pose as a notorious masked gangster and his aide.

description: Matthew 15:1 - 28:20 - The year is about 62 A.D., and the aging apostle Matthew recalls the remarkable events he witnessed as a young man. As his story unfolds, the centuries melt away and ...
